title: Episode #24: Federal Public Defender Miriam Conrad on the Rezwan Ferdaus Case and FBI Counterterrorism Sting Operations
itunes:title: Episode #24: Federal Public Defender Miriam Conrad on the Rezwan Ferdaus Case and FBI Counterterrorism Sting Operations
itunes:subtitle: Federal Public Defender Miriam Conrad talks with Lawfare's Alan Rozenshtein about the case of Rezwan Ferdaus, a 26-year old U.S.-born citizen of Bangladeshi origin who recently pled guilty to terrorism charges arising out of an FBI sting operation.
description:
Federal Public Defender Miriam Conrad talks with Lawfare's Alan Rozenshtein about the case of Rezwan Ferdaus, a 26-year old U.S.-born citizen of Bangladeshi origin who recently pled guilty to terrorism charges arising out of an FBI sting operation.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
